title: Business Strategy Practical Skills Enhancement: AI Tool Utilization Awareness and Educational Impact Analysis: Northeast India

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary digital literacy and survey methodology comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can independently design surveys analyzing the educational utilization status of AI tools.
Participants can process collected quantitative and qualitative data using analysis tools such as JASP and MAXQDA to derive meaningful insights.
Participants can present project-based strategies for establishing AI tool integration plans within an organization based on research findings.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
